You are given a time in 24-hour format (hh:mm), where hh is the hour (0 to 23) and mm is the minute (0 to 59).  You are also given an integer a representing the number of minutes to add to the current time.  

Output the time after adding a minutes.  Make sure to format the output as hh:mm.
Given a time in 24-hour format (hh:mm), calculate the time after a given number of minutes have passed. Output the resulting time in 24-hour format.
